txt.en: Adjusting this mirror has helped the paths of the Dolven-view to be much better lit than they were previously. This will likely save many from falling or taking a wrong turn.

'So you were the one that adjusted the light, were you? At first I thought there was a fire, and that we were about to be attacked, but then I realized that the light was a warm, gentle one. \n\n'I knew then that it came from one of the ancient mirrors I've heard so much about. I am only happy that I lived to see the beauty of the light system in Khazad-dûm.'
The paths to and from the Dolven-view are dark, but adjusting an ancient light-reflecting mirror has helped to light the way.
Speak with Slagvi at the Dolven-view
Slagvi is at the Dolven-view camp in the Great Delving in Moria.\n\nYou should speak with Slagvi of the mirror you adjusted.
